summary: Pip is a street kid who's meeting life head-on in the big city. On his eighteenth birthday he receives his grandfather's World War II memoirs on audio cassette, a gift that awakens the ... See full summary »
cast: Paul Anthony|Brendan Fletcher|Clarence Sponagle|Mark Hildreth|Carly Pope|David Beazely|Thea Gill|Alan Cumming|Ian McKellen|Serge Houde|Adrien Dorval|Gabrielle Rose|Paul Dzenkiw|Ryan McDonell|Kevan Ohtsji|Jesai Jayhmes|Crystal Heidrick|Brenda Crichlow|Randal Edwards|Matt Fentiman|Lawrence Jacob Milman|Sebastian Gacki|Jano Frandsen|Carlos Joe Costa|John Ziros
title: Eighteen
